# firehydrant Provider



## Example Usage

```terraform
terraform {
  required_providers {
    firehydrant = {
      source  = "firehydrant/firehydrant"
      version = "0.1.6"
    }
  }
}

provider "firehydrant" {
  # Configuration options
}
```

### Optional

- `api_key` (String, Sensitive)
- `server_url` (String) Server URL (defaults to https://api.firehydrant.io)
